## Checklist

- [ ] Cross-browser manual test (Edge, Chrome)
- [ ] Accessibility (tab order, focus indicators, contrast)
- [ ] Security (no unsafe HTML, no external network calls)
- [ ] README/Docs updated if behavior changed
- [ ] Linked issues (e.g., Fixes #123)
